[page:AbstractSubscribeComponent] →

[name]

FogComponent

Component

<ngx3js-fog [ color ]="..." [ debug ]="..." [ density ]="..." [ enabled ]="..." [ far ]="..." [ near ]="..." [ type ]="..." [ windowExport ]="..." ></ngx3js-fog>

Properties - Input

See the base [page:AbstractSubscribeComponent AbstractSubscribeComponent] class for common input properties.

[property:ThreeColor color]

Fog color. Example: If set to black, far away objects will be rendered black.

[property:number density]

Defines how fast the fog will grow dense.
Default is 0.00025.

[property:number far]

The maximum distance at which fog stops being calculated and applied. Objects that are more than 'far' units away from the active camera won't be affected by fog.
Default is 1000.

[property:number near]

The minimum distance to start applying fog. Objects that are less than 'near' units from the active camera won't be affected by fog.
Default is 1.

[property:string type]

The Fog type.

[page:Fog Fog] - THREE.Fog - fog (default)
[page:FogExp2 FogExp2] - THREE.FogExp2 - fogexp2, exp, exp2

Properties - Output

See the base [page:AbstractSubscribeComponent AbstractSubscribeComponent] class for common output properties.

Methods

See the base [page:AbstractSubscribeComponent AbstractSubscribeComponent] class for common methods.

Gets fog
